text: McShan is an unincorporated community in Pickens County, Alabama, United States. It was named to honor the McShan Lumber Company, which moved to the location in 1844.http://www.mcshanlumber.com/aboutus.html ==Geography== McShan is located at and has an elevation of . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Alabama Category:Unincorporated communities in Pickens County, Alabama
title: McShan, Alabama
